results.title: GitHub Actions - Certifications
results.description: This exam is designed for DevOps engineers, software developers, and IT professionals with intermediate level experience in GitHub Actions, including workflow creation, automation, and CI/CD pipeline management.

descriptions.content: This exam is designed for DevOps engineers, software developers, and IT professionals with intermediate level experience in GitHub Actions, including workflow creation, automation, and CI/CD pipeline management.

results.title: Automate your workflow with GitHub Actions Part 1 of 2 - Training
results.description: Learn how GitHub Actions enables you to automate your software development cycle.

descriptions.content: Learn how GitHub Actions enables you to automate your software development cycle.

results.title: Deploy by Using GitHub Actions - Azure App Service
results.description: Learn how to deploy your code to Azure App Service from a CI/CD pipeline by using GitHub Actions. Customize the build tasks and run complex deployments.

descriptions.content: Learn how to deploy your code to Azure App Service from a CI/CD pipeline by using GitHub Actions.
